glsa.title: Poppler: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Poppler, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Poppler is a cross-platform PDF rendering library originally based on Xpdf.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Poppler. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF in an application linked against Poppler, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
